entry.title: Compiling Fceux With Emscripten
entry.content:
I’m trying to compile fceux with Emscripten to see if it’s able to run a nes emulator within a mobile browser. Which means without webGL support.

I tried RetroArch with fceu-next, but that means I had to deal with 2 code bases. I decided to try the original fceux.

After a few days of trial and error, it finally builded successfully. It seems to run on destop browsers(Firefox, Chrome, Safari), but unfortuanlly the framerate is too low on mobile ones(Safari & Chrome on iOS) and there’s no sound.

Repo: fceux.js

End of the story :(
